channel.title: CVE Feed for webxmedia -- BAN Users
channel.description: The latest CVEs for webxmedia -- BAN Users

item.title: CVE-2023-4153|2023-09-13T02:54:12.332Z -- webxmedia -- ban%20users
item.description: The BAN Users plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to privilege escalation in versions up to, and including, 1.5.3 due to a missing capability check on the 'w3dev_save_ban_user_settings_callback' function. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with minimal permissions such as a subscriber, to modify the plugin settings to access the ban and unban functionality and set the role of the unbanned user.
